it.polimi.sw2019.model

Class Effect

  • java.lang.Object
    • it.polimi.sw2019.model.Effect

  • public class Effect
extends java.lang.Object
    Author:
    poligenius this class was made to save info about effects and to know if they are usable for the player (it contains some game logic)

        public java.util.List<Cell> reachableCells(Player owner)
        used to know cell you can reach with your weapon

        Returns:

      • shootableCells

        public java.util.List<Cell> shootableCells(Player owner)
        used to know cell you can shoot in with your weapon
        Parameters:
        owner - player who is shooting
        Returns:
        the cells where the weapon can shoot with at least one player inside

      • reachablePlayers

        Returns:

      • usableEffect

        public boolean usableEffect(Player owner,
                            java.util.List<Player> allPlayers)
        CALL ONLY IF YOU KNOW THE EFFECT IS NOT MOVE TYPE
        Parameters:
        allPlayers - contains the list of all the players, it will be passed from the view to usableWeapon that calls this method
        owner - the player who is using the weapon
        Returns:
        true if the player can actually pay and apply the effect
